allow: Bash(bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; SCRIPT_DIR=""/Users/douglasbailey/bin""; source ""${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/common.sh""; source ""${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/platform.sh""; source ""${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/config.sh""; echo ""Platform: $PLATFORM""; echo ""Colors loaded: BOLD=$\([[ -n ""$BOLD"" ]] && echo yes || echo no\)""; echo ""Functions: $\(declare -F | grep -c ""^declare -f""\)""')

Bash(bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; SCRIPT_DIR=""/Users/douglasbailey/bin""; source ""${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/common.sh""; source ""${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/platform.sh""; source ""${SCRIPT_DIR}/lib/config.sh""; declare -F | awk ""{print \\$3}"" | sort')
Bash(for script in git-start git-save git-sync git-push-pr git-cleanup git-hotfix git-status-report)
Bash(for script in git-setup git-start git-save git-sync git-push-pr git-cleanup git-hotfix git-status-report)
